abstract: Growth of its soft drinks was strong in emerging markets and sales rose slightly.
snippet: Growth of its soft drinks was strong in emerging markets and sales rose slightly.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola said Tuesday its third-quarter profit rose only slightly from the comparable period last year as sales rose strongly in emerging markets like India and China but continued to slump in North America and Europe.

headline.main: Profit Edges Up at Coke, but Sales Stall in North America
headline.print_headline: Coke Profit Edges Up; American Sales Stall
